title: Baxar
description: Baxar is an online marketplace designed to provide a wide range of quality products at affordable prices, with a focus on accessibility and convenience. Targeting cuban market, it offers an e-commerce platform where users can browse and purchase goods digitally.

title: RadioCast
description: Radiocast is a practice project hosted on GitHub Pages, created as a personal exercise where users can listen to radio music for free. It offers a simple interface to enjoy a curated selection of radio stations.

title: Pokédex
description: Pokedex is a practice project hosted on GitHub Pages, developed as a personal exercise to create a digital catalog of Pokémon. It allows users to explore a collection of Pokémon data, with details like names, types, and stats pulled from an external source.

title: Sophie Mystique
description: Sophie Mystique was my first sold project, a personal website created for a singer named Sophie at sophiemystique.com. The design was crafted per her request to showcase her music and persona, offering a custom digital space for her audience.

title: The Witcher API
description: The Witcher API is an ongoing team project, currently under development as an exploration into API creation. It aims to provide a data service inspired by The Witcher universe, delivering details about characters, creatures, and lore from the iconic franchise.

title: La Baya Amarilla
description: La Baya Amarilla is a personal practice project, a satirical blog or newspaper I created to experiment with web development. Inspired by The Babylon Bee, it features humorous takes on various topics, serving as a solo effort to sharpen my coding and creative skills.
